summary: A visual history of Italian western cinema in the 60s and 70s.
cast: Ferdinando Baldi|Manolo Bolognini|Enzo G. Castellari|Sergio Corbucci|Alex Cox|Damiano Damiani|Sergio Donati|Clint Eastwood|Christopher Frayling|Sergio Leone|Tomas Milian|Ennio Morricone|Franco Nero|Sergio Sollima
title: The Spaghetti West
